personal.name: Fernando Pinto Villarroel
personal.title: Software Engineer & Linguist
personal.subtitle: Navigating the tech universe through hands-on projects and creative solutions.
personal.bio: Passionate Software Engineering student with experience in full-stack development. I bring together technical precision with linguistic understanding to create innovative solutions. Currently pursuing my degree while building scalable applications and exploring the intersection of technology and human communication.

projects.title: UNO Game Platform
projects.description: Real-time multiplayer UNO game featuring complex game logic, visual effects, and seamless player communication through advanced WebSocket implementation.
features: Real-time multiplayer gameplay with synchronized game state.
Advanced state management using functional programming patterns.
WebSocket-based communication for instant player interactions.

projects.title: Space Invaders
projects.description: A classic Space Invaders game developed in C# as part of Programming 3 coursework, implementing advanced OOP principles and two-way data binding for real-time user interactions.
features: Object-oriented programming with advanced design patterns (e.g., Singleton, Factory, Strategy, Composite patterns)
Interactive gameplay with scoring system
Two-way data binding for dynamic UI updates

projects.title: Home Mapper
projects.description: Interactive web application for visualizing forest fires in Bolivia with real-time data processing, geospatial analysis, and NASA API integration for comprehensive wildfire monitoring.
features: Real-time forest fire visualization with NASA API integration.
Interactive geospatial mapping with advanced data processing.
Advanced state management for real-time data updates.

projects.title: Qatu Hatun E-commerce
projects.description: Complete e-commerce platform featuring responsive design, inventory management, and real-time chat integration using MQTT protocol for enhanced customer communication.
features: Responsive single-page application built with Webpack.
Real-time chat system using MQTT (Mosquitto) protocol.
RESTful API architecture for seamless data management.

projects.title: Booking Management System
projects.description: Enterprise-level booking system with advanced reservation management, reactive forms, comprehensive validations, and role-based access control for scalable business operations.
features: Reactive forms with comprehensive input validations.
Role-based access control with multiple permission levels.
Enterprise-grade security and data protection measures.

projects.title: Say2You
projects.description: Real-time chat application CLI developed with C#, featuring comprehensive messaging capabilities, contact management, and group channels through MQTT protocol implementation.
features: Advanced messaging system with MQTT real-time communication.
Contact and Group management system with registration and deletion capabilities.
Secure message encryption and user authentication.

projects.title: Tongue Pathology Detector
projects.description: AI-powered medical application for real-time tongue pathology detection using advanced machine learning models and comprehensive image processing algorithms.
features: Real-time ML model integration with TensorFlow
Advanced medical data analysis
Accurate pathology detection

projects.title: NavigAIte Browser
projects.description: Semantic machine learning browser with intelligent content discovery, AI-powered search capabilities, and advanced natural language processing for enhanced web navigation.
features: Intelligent semantic search with natural language processing.
AI-driven content discovery and recommendation engine.
Advanced API integration with vector database support.
Machine learning-enhanced browsing experience.

projects.title: Crowdsourced Ideation Solution API
projects.description: Multi-language API system developed in Java and C# for comprehensive user management and content publishing, featuring advanced database migration strategies from SQL to NoSQL.
features: Multi-language API architecture with Java and C# implementation.
Advanced database migration using ELT and ETL strategies.
Spring Security advanced configurations.

projects.title: Snacks API
projects.description: Comprehensive API solution for institutional snack management using QR code integration, designed to handle registered user validation and prevent duplicate claims during events.
features: QR code integration for secure snack distribution validation.
Advanced user registration and period-based claim management.
Validation system to prevent duplicate distributions.
Event management capabilities for multi-day institutional fairs.

projects.title: Spotify API Testing Automation Framework
projects.description: Comprehensive testing automation framework developed with Cucumber.js for systematic validation of Spotify's official API endpoints and functionality.
features: Behavior-driven development with Cucumber.js framework.
Comprehensive API endpoint testing and validation.
Automated test suite for Spotify's official API functionality.
Advanced reporting and test result analysis.
Continuous integration support for automated testing workflows.

projects.title: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Desktop application for real-time visualization of sorting algorithms, developed with Java Swing and implementing advanced object-oriented programming principles and design patterns.
features: Real-time visualization of multiple sorting algorithm processes.
Implementation of advanced design patterns (Strategy, Singleton, Factory).
Extensible architecture for easy addition of new sorting algorithms.
Interactive user interface with customizable visualization parameters.
Educational tool with step-by-step algorithm execution display.

projects.title: Game2D
projects.description: 2D adventure game developed with Java and Java Swing, following the YouTube series tutorials from @RyiSnow (https://youtu.be/om59cwR7psI?si=2L8029wQ4tPiGi_p) to learn game development fundamentals including sprites, music integration, and map design.
features: Complete 2D game implementation with Java Swing framework.
Custom map design and level progression mechanics.
Educational project demonstrating game development fundamentals.
